content: Weâ€™ve got a brand new competition for you guys, and I hope you like it!The rules are simple! I have played a 20$ Bonus Buy round in The Dog House Megaways by Pragmatic slot. All you need to do is to guess the amount of money I have won. The closest predictor will get that amount to his Winz.io balance.I have recorded a video of my spin. You can check the first part here:The full video will be uploaded once we announce one lucky winner.How to participate:Read the Terms and Conditions belowWrite your winning amount prediction in USDWait for the end of the competitionHere you can also check our dedicated The Dog House Megaways game review for more information regarding this slot.Terms and conditionsThe winner will be announced on the 17 of May at 12:00 GMT.Newbie Bitcointalk accounts are not allowed to participate.Users with negative feedback related to alt accounts are not allowed to participate.The closest predicted winning amount will determine the winner.In case of multiple winners, the prize will be divided in equal portions.You can make only one prediction and cannot edit it.The winnings will be paid to your Winz.io account in BTC or converted to the currency of your balance.All the winnings have no wagering requirements or other limitations.
